text: Kartick Chandra Paul (born 1975) is a politician and businessman representing the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) in the Raiganj constituency of West Bengal. == Political career == Kartick Chandra Paul has beaten Kalyani Krishna from the All India by 68197 votes in the Raiganj constituency of West Bengal. Thus, he secured a seat in the Indian Parliament as a Member of Parliament (MP). ==References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians Category:Politicians from West Bengal
title: Kartick Chandra Paul
